title: Seashell caramels
description: These pretty dark chocolate shells are filled with caramel and sealed with a white chocolate base. Equipment: You will need 20 assorted seashell or similar chocolate moulds and a sugar thermometer.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz dark chocolate (use a good bar of chocolate, not chocolate chips), chopped finely
good pinch of sea salt crystals
300g/10½oz dark chocolate (use a good bar of chocolate, not chocolate chips), chopped finely
good pinch of sea salt crystals
